subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Martin Brodeur stopped 43 shots and Adam Henrique scored at 3 minutes 47 seconds of the second overtime to lead the Devils to a Game 7 victory over the Florida Panthers.
snippet: Martin Brodeur stopped 43 shots and Adam Henrique scored at 3 minutes 47 seconds of the second overtime to lead the Devils to a Game 7 victory over the Florida Panthers.
